title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for Oct. 25
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for Oct. 25
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010David Wilson\u0010Stocks Editor\u0010Bloomberg News\u0010Discussing his "Stock of the Day" Horace Mann Educators (HMN). Horace Mann Educators Inc.'s shares rose to a record after the insurance company, which caters to teachers and other employees at public schools, posted third-quarter results. Earnings were well above the three analyst estimates in a Bloomberg survey. Horace Mann's ratio of claims payments to premium income in its property and casualty business fell 5.7 percentage points from a year ago.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
